title: Four Fast Guns (1960 Western) Directed by William J. Hole Jr.

sources.title: Four Fast Guns (1960 Western) Directed by William J. Hole Jr.
sources.description:
In 1873, the town of Purgatory hires a town-tamer, but the evil saloon owner hires three gunfighters to kill him.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/r6rUDZzLyTs

Director: William J. Hole Jr.
Writers: James Edmiston, Dallas Gaultois
Stars: James Craig, Martha Vickers, Edgar Buchanan
Genre: Western
